testCases.title: Verify visibility of all key UI elements on the Sign Up page
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page.
steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Verify 'Logo' image is visible: await expect(page.getByAltText('Logo')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Start creating!' heading is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('heading', { name: 'Start creating!' })).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Already have an account?' text is visible: await expect(page.getByText('Already have an account?')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Sign In Here' link is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('link', { name: 'Sign In Here' })).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Sign up with Google' button is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Sign up with Google' })).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Sign up with Facebook' button is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Sign up with Facebook' })).toBeVisible()
Verify 'First Name *' label is visible: await expect(page.getByLabelText('First Name *')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Last Name *' label is visible: await expect(page.getByLabelText('Last Name *')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Phone Number' label is visible: await expect(page.getByLabelText('Phone Number')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Email *' label is visible: await expect(page.getByLabelText('Email *')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Password *' label is visible: await expect(page.getByLabelText('Password *')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Re-Enter Password *' label is visible: await expect(page.getByLabelText('Re-Enter Password *')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Sign Up' button is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Sign Up' })).toBeVisible()
expected: All specified UI elements are visible and correctly displayed on the Sign Up page.

testCases.title: Verify user can successfully sign up with valid required data
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page.
steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Enter first name: await page.locator(inputs.firstNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.firstName)
Enter last name: await page.locator(inputs.lastNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.lastName)
Enter phone number: await page.locator(inputs.phoneNumberInputLocator).fill(inputs.phoneNumber)
Enter email address: await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.email)
Enter password: await page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Re-enter password: await page.locator(inputs.reEnterPasswordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click the 'Sign Up' button: await page.locator(inputs.signUpButtonLocator).click()
Verify successful redirection to a dashboard or success message: await expect(page).toHaveURL(/dashboard/)
expected: User is successfully registered and redirected to the dashboard or a success message is displayed.
No validation errors are shown.

testCases.title: Verify sign up fails when 'First Name' field is empty
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page.
steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Ensure first name field is empty: await page.locator(inputs.firstNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.firstName)
Fill other required fields: await page.locator(inputs.lastNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.lastName)
await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.email)
await page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
await page.locator(inputs.reEnterPasswordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click 'Sign Up' button: await page.locator(inputs.signUpButtonLocator).click()
Verify 'First Name' input shows validation message: await expect(page.locator(inputs.firstNameInputLocator)).toHaveJSProperty('validationMessage', 'Please fill out this field.')
expected: A browser-level or UI validation message prompts the user to fill out the first name field.
User remains on the sign up page.

steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)

Fill email: await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.email)

expected: A browser-level or UI validation message prompts the user to fill out the password field.

steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Fill first name: await page.locator(inputs.firstNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.firstName)

Fill email: await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.email)
Fill password: await page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Ensure re-enter password field is empty: await page.locator(inputs.reEnterPasswordInputLocator).fill(inputs.reEnterPassword)
Click 'Sign Up' button: await page.locator(inputs.signUpButtonLocator).click()
Verify 'Re-Enter Password' input shows validation message: await expect(page.locator(inputs.reEnterPasswordInputLocator)).toHaveJSProperty('validationMessage', 'Please fill out this field.')

testCases.title: Verify sign up fails with invalid email format
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page.
steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Fill all fields with valid data except for email: await page.locator(inputs.firstNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.firstName)
await page.locator(inputs.lastNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.lastName)
Enter an invalid email format: await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.email)
await page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
await page.locator(inputs.reEnterPasswordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click 'Sign Up' button: await page.locator(inputs.signUpButtonLocator).click()
Verify 'Email' input shows validation message: await expect(page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator)).toHaveJSProperty('validationMessage', expect.stringContaining('@'))
expected: A browser-level or UI validation message prompts the user for a valid email format.
User remains on the sign up page.

testCases.title: Verify sign up fails when passwords do not match
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page.
steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Fill all fields with valid data: await page.locator(inputs.firstNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.firstName)
await page.locator(inputs.lastNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.lastName)
await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.email)
Enter first password: await page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Enter a different password in re-enter field: await page.locator(inputs.reEnterPasswordInputLocator).fill(inputs.reEnterPassword)
Click 'Sign Up' button: await page.locator(inputs.signUpButtonLocator).click()
Verify an error message about mismatched passwords is displayed: await expect(page.getByText(inputs.expectedErrorMessage)).toBeVisible()
expected: An error message indicating that passwords do not match is displayed.
User remains on the sign up page.

testCases.title: Verify sign up fails with a password that is too short
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page.

inputs.expectedErrorMessage: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Fill all fields with valid data except for password: await page.locator(inputs.firstNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.firstName)
await page.locator(inputs.lastNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.lastName)
await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.email)
Enter a short password: await page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Re-enter the short password: await page.locator(inputs.reEnterPasswordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click 'Sign Up' button: await page.locator(inputs.signUpButtonLocator).click()
Verify an error message for short password is displayed: await expect(page.getByText(inputs.expectedErrorMessage)).toBeVisible()
expected: An error message indicating the password is too short is displayed.
User remains on the sign up page.

testCases.title: Verify sign up handles invalid phone number format (if required/validated)
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page. Phone number is not strictly required but validation might apply.

inputs.expectedErrorMessage: Please enter a valid phone number.

steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Fill all required fields: await page.locator(inputs.firstNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.firstName)
await page.locator(inputs.lastNameInputLocator).fill(inputs.lastName)
Enter an invalid phone number: await page.locator(inputs.phoneNumberInputLocator).fill(inputs.phoneNumber)
await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.email)
await page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
await page.locator(inputs.reEnterPasswordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click 'Sign Up' button: await page.locator(inputs.signUpButtonLocator).click()
Verify an error message for invalid phone number format is displayed: await expect(page.getByText(inputs.expectedErrorMessage)).toBeVisible()
expected: An error message indicating an invalid phone number format is displayed.
User remains on the sign up page.

testCases.title: Verify 'Sign In Here' link navigates to the Login page
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page.
steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click the 'Sign In Here' link: await page.locator(inputs.signInLinkLocator).click()
Verify navigation to the Login page: await expect(page).toHaveURL(inputs.expectedLoginUrl)
expected: User is successfully redirected to the Login page.

testCases.title: Verify 'Sign up with Google' button initiates Google authentication flow
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page.
steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click the 'Sign up with Google' button: await page.locator(inputs.googleSignUpButtonLocator).click()
Verify that a new page or modal related to Google authentication is opened: await page.waitForURL(/accounts.google.com/)
expected: The browser navigates to or opens a modal for the Google authentication process.

testCases.title: Verify 'Sign up with Facebook' button initiates Facebook authentication flow
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the signup page.
steps: Navigate to the signup page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click the 'Sign up with Facebook' button: await page.locator(inputs.facebookSignUpButtonLocator).click()
Verify that a new page or modal related to Facebook authentication is opened: await page.waitForURL(/www.facebook.com/)
expected: The browser navigates to or opens a modal for the Facebook authentication process.
